subject: No Confirmation or Tracking Number
description_text:
Hello,

I made a purchase on Thursday for your Ultra Pro Pedals with Haptics for
449$. I received no confirmation email or tracking information. The order
name is under Lucas Nevins and the confirmation ID is VIDK9NI9A

Any help regarding this is appreciated.

Respectfully,
Lucas Nevins

conversations.body_text: Hi Lucas Nevins,    Sorry, since you didn't provide an email address, you didn't receive the order confirmation and shipping notification. Here is your tracking link:  https://www.fedex.com/wtrk/track/?trknbr=885251082030
